name: Star Trek: D-A-C
description:
Star Trek: D-A-C is an arcade game developed by Naked Sky Entertainment. It came out on 13-05-2009. Paramount Digital Entertainment published the game. Star Trek: D-A-C has a Metascore of 55, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
You can play Star Trek: D-A-C on PC and PlayStation 3.
